name: dramaturgical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the art or the theory of writing and putting on plays, especially for the theatre: We discussed the musical and dramaturgical structure of the opera. Despite its dramaturgical flaws, the play is full of wonderful music. His dramaturgic skills were not really adequate for the job. Related word
dramaturgy
More examplesFewer examplesThe play needs dramaturgical attention, but there is definite potential here.She really respected the author's dramaturgical ideas.This is a project that is full of dramaturgic possibilities.It is an opera that poses considerable challenges, both technical and dramaturgical.We are running a series of workshops to teach dramaturgical methods and performance skills.
